active.description: The active state of the control. This is typically used to highlight components.
active.description_zh: 控制项的 active 状态。这通常用于高亮显示组件。

append-icon.description: Creates a v-icon component after default content in the append slot.
append-icon.description_zh: 在追加槽中的默认内容之后创建 v 图标组件。

auto-select-first.description: When searching, will always highlight the first option and select it on blur. exact will only highlight and select exact matches.
auto-select-first.description_zh: 搜索时，将始终突出显示第一个选项并在模糊时选择它。 精确只会突出显示并选择完全匹配。

base-color.description: Sets the color of the input when it is not focused.
base-color.description_zh: 设置输入未聚焦时的颜色。

bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control’s background. Used on components that also support the color prop. - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
bg-color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件的背景。 用于也支持 color 属性的组件。 - 支持实用颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)）。 在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

center-affix.description: Vertically align appendInner, prependInner, clearIcon and label in the center.
center-affix.description_zh: 将appendInner、prependInner、clearIcon 和label 垂直居中对齐。

chips.description: Changes display of selections to chips.
chips.description_zh: 将选择的显示更改为筹码。

clearable.description: Allows for the component to be cleared.

clear-icon.description: The icon used when the clearable prop is set to true.
clear-icon.description_zh: 当clearable属性设置为true时使用的图标。

closable-chips.description: Enables the closable prop on all v-chip components.
closable-chips.description_zh: 在所有 v-chip 组件上启用 closeable 属性。

close-text.description: Text set to to the inputs aria-label and title when input menu is closed.
close-text.description_zh: 当输入菜单关闭时，文本设置为输入 aria-label 和标题。

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用颜色（例如 success 或紫色）或 css 颜色（例如 success 或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)）。 在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

counter.description: Creates a counter for the input length, if no number is specified it defaults to 25 and no validation will be applied.
counter.description_zh: 为输入长度创建一个计数器，如果未指定数字，则默认为25，不会应用任何验证。

counter-value.description: Function returns the counter display text.
counter-value.description_zh: 函数返回计数器显示文本。

custom-filter.description: Function used to filter items, called for each filterable key on each item in the list. The first argument is the filterable value from the item, the second is the search term, and the third is the internal item object. The function should return true if the item should be included in the filtered list, or the index of the match in the value if it should be included with the result highlighted.
custom-filter.description_zh: 用于过滤项目的函数，调用列表中每个项目的每个可过滤键。 第一个参数是项目的可过滤值，第二个参数是搜索词，第三个参数是内部项目对象。 如果该项目应包含在过滤列表中，则该函数应返回 true；如果应包含在突出显示的结果中，则该函数应返回值中匹配项的索引。

custom-key-filter.description: Function used on specific keys within the item object. customFilter is skipped for columns with customKeyFilter specified.
custom-key-filter.description_zh: 用于项目对象内特定键的函数。 对于指定了 customKeyFilter 的列，将跳过 customFilter。

density.description: Adjust the vertical height used by the component.
density.description_zh: 调整组件使用的垂直高度。

direction.description: Changes the direction of the input.

disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the input.
disabled.description_zh: 删除单击或定位输入的功能。

eager.description: Forces the component’s content to render when it mounts. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.
eager.description_zh: 强制组件的内容在安装时呈现。 如果您的内容不会在您想要抓取以进行 SEO 的 DOM 中呈现，那么这非常有用。

error.description: Puts the input in a manual error state.
error.description_zh: 将输入置于手动错误状态。

error-messages.description: Puts the input in an error state and passes through custom error messages. Will be combined with any validations that occur from the rules prop. This field will not trigger validation.
error-messages.description_zh: 将输入置于错误状态并传递自定义错误消息。 将与规则属性中发生的任何验证相结合。 该字段不会触发验证。

filter-keys.description: Array of specific keys to filter on the item.
filter-keys.description_zh: 用于过滤项目的特定键数组。

filter-mode.description: Controls how the results of customFilter and customKeyFilter are combined. All modes only apply customFilter to columns not specified in customKeyFilter.some: There is at least one match from either the custom filter or the custom key filter.every: All columns match either the custom filter or the custom key filter.union: There is at least one match from the custom filter, or all columns match the custom key filters.intersection: There is at least one match from the custom filter, and all columns match the custom key filters.
filter-mode.description_zh: 控制如何组合 customFilter 和 customKeyFilter 的结果。 所有模式仅将customFilter应用于customKeyFilter中未指定的列。some：自定义过滤器或自定义键过滤器中至少有一个匹配项。every：所有列都匹配自定义过滤器或自定义键过滤器。union：有 自定义过滤器中至少有一项匹配，或者所有列都与自定义关键过滤器匹配。交集：自定义过滤器中至少有一项匹配，并且所有列都与自定义关键过滤器匹配。

flat.description: Removes box shadow when using a variant with elevation.
flat.description_zh: 使用带标高的变体时移除框阴影。

focused.description: Forces the component to use the focused style.
focused.description_zh: 强制组件使用聚焦时的样式。

hide-details.description: Hides hint and validation errors. When set to auto messages will be rendered only if there’s a message (hint, error message, counter value etc) to display.
hide-details.description_zh: 隐藏提示和验证错误。 设置为自动消息时，仅当有消息（提示、错误消息、计数器值等）要显示时才会呈现。

hide-no-data.description: Hides the menu when there are no options to show. Used to prevent the menu from being opened before the results are fetched asynchronously. There is also the effect of opening the menu when the items array changes, if it is not already open.
hide-no-data.description_zh: 当没有要显示的选项时，隐藏菜单。用于防止在异步获取结果之前打开菜单。也有打开菜单的效果，当“ items 数组改变，如果还没有打开。

hide-selected.description: Do not display in the select menu items that are already selected.
hide-selected.description_zh: 不要在选择菜单中显示已选择的项目。

hint.description: Displays hint text below the input when focused. Force this always open with the persistent-hint property.
hint.description_zh: 聚焦时在输入下方显示提示文本。 使用持久提示属性强制始终打开它。

id.description: Sets the DOM id on the component.
id.description_zh: 设置组件上的 DOM id。

item-children.description: Property on supplied items that contains its children.
item-children.description_zh: 包含其子项的所提供项目的属性。

item-props.description: Props object that will be applied to each item component. true will treat the original object as raw props and pass it directly to the component.
item-props.description_zh: 将应用于每个项目组件的 Props 对象。 true 会将原始对象视为原始 props 并将其直接传递给组件。

items.description: An array of strings or objects used for automatically generating children components.
items.description_zh: 用于自动生成子组件的字符串或对象数组。

item-title.description: Property on supplied items that contains its title.
item-title.description_zh: 所提供项目上包含其标题的属性。

item-value.description: Property on supplied items that contains its value.
item-value.description_zh: 所提供项目上包含其值的属性。

label.description: Sets the text of the v-label or v-field-label component.
label.description_zh: 设置 v-label 或 v-field-label 组件的文本。

loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - primary, secondary, success, info, warning, error) or a Boolean which uses the component color (set by color prop - if it’s supported by the component) or the primary color.
loading.description_zh: 显示线性进度条。 可以是指定应用于进度条的颜色的字符串（任何材质颜色或主题颜色 - 主要、次要、成功、信息、警告、错误）或使用组件颜色的布尔值（由 color 属性设置 - 如果 它由组件支持）或原色。

max-errors.description: Control the maximum number of shown errors from validation.
max-errors.description_zh: 控制验证中显示的错误的最大数量。

menu.description: Renders with the menu open by default.
menu.description_zh: 默认情况下，在打开菜单的情况下进行渲染。

menu-props.description: Pass props through to the v-menu component. Accepts an object with anything from v-menu props, camelCase keys are recommended.
menu-props.description_zh: 将 props 传递给 v-menu 组件。 接受带有 v-menu 属性中任何内容的对象，建议使用驼峰式键。

messages.description: Displays a list of messages or a single message if using a string.
messages.description_zh: 如果使用字符串，则显示消息列表或单个消息。

:v-model.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the multiple prop, this defaults to an empty array.
:v-model.description_zh: 组件的 v-model 值。 如果组件支持 multiple 属性，则默认为空数组。

multiple.description: Changes select to multiple. Accepts array for value.
multiple.description_zh: 将选择更改为多个。 接受数组作为值。

name.description_zh: 设置组件的 name 属性.

no-data-text.description: Text shown when no items are provided to the component.
no-data-text.description_zh: 未向组件提供任何项目时显示的文本。

no-filter.description: Do not apply filtering when searching. Useful when data is being filtered server side.
no-filter.description_zh: 搜索时不要应用过滤。 在服务器端过滤数据时很有用。

open-on-clear.description: Open’s the menu whenever the clear icon is clicked.
open-on-clear.description_zh: 每当单击清除图标时都会打开菜单。

open-text.description: Text set to to the inputs aria-label and title when input menu is open.
open-text.description_zh: 当输入菜单打开时，文本设置为输入 aria-label 和标题。

persistent-clear.description: Always show the clearable icon when the input is dirty (By default it only shows on hover).
persistent-clear.description_zh: 当输入脏时始终显示可清除的图标（默认情况下仅在悬停时显示）。

persistent-counter.description: Forces counter to always be visible.

persistent-hint.description: Forces hint to always be visible.

persistent-placeholder.description: Forces placeholder to always be visible.

placeholder.description_zh: 设置输入的占位符文本。

prepend-icon.description: Prepends an icon to the outnside the component’s input, uses the same syntax as v-icon.
prepend-icon.description_zh: 在组件输入的外部添加一个图标，使用与 v-icon 相同的语法。

prepend-inner-icon.description: Creates a v-icon component in the prepend-inner slot.
prepend-inner-icon.description_zh: 在 prepend-inner 插槽中创建 v 图标组件。

return-object.description: Changes the selection behavior to return the object directly rather than the value specified with item-value.
return-object.description_zh: 更改选择行为以直接返回对象，而不是使用 item-value 指定的值。

role.description: The role attribute applied to the input.
role.description_zh: 应用于输入的角色属性。

rounded.description: Adds a border radius to the input.

rules.description: Accepts a mixed array of types function, boolean and string. Functions pass an input value as an argument and must return either true / false or a string containing an error message. The input field will enter an error state if a function returns (or any value in the array contains) false or is a string.
rules.description_zh: 接受函数、布尔值和字符串类型的混合数组。 函数将输入值作为参数传递，并且必须返回 true / false 或包含错误消息的字符串。 如果函数返回（或数组中包含的任何值）为 false 或为字符串，则输入字段将进入错误状态。

search.description: Text input used to filter items.
search.description_zh: 用于过滤项目的文本输入。

single-line.description: Label does not move on focus/dirty.
single-line.description_zh: 标签在焦点/脏污上不移动。

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 指定该组件及其所有子组件的主题。

transition.description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the built in or custom transition.
transition.description_zh: 设置组件转换。 可以是内置或自定义过渡之一。

validate-on.description: Change what type of event triggers validation to run.
validate-on.type: 'lazy' | 'blur' | 'input' | 'submit' | 'blur lazy' | 'input lazy' | 'submit lazy' | 'lazy blur' | 'lazy input' | 'lazy submit'
validate-on.description_zh: 更改触发验证运行的事件类型。

value-comparator.description: Apply a custom comparison algorithm to compare model-value and values contains in the items prop.
value-comparator.description_zh: 应用自定义比较算法来比较模型值和 items 属性中包含的值。

variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.
variant.description_zh: 对组件应用独特的样式。
